2018 PRL100 Prep

Plan overview

Weeks: 16

Duration: 5h 34m/week

Stress points: 366/week

Z2: 10h 31m

Z3: 38h 57m

Z4: 11h 28m

Z5: 3h 1m

Z6: 1h 41m

    Day 1 - Pre-Training Plan

    10min from 25 to 65% FTP5min @ 65% FTP2min free ride4min @ 80% FTP2min free ride3min @ 95% FTP2min free ride2min @ 109% FTP2min free ride1min @ 125% FTP2min free ride15min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n10min from <span\ndata-value="25.449997" data-unit="relpow">25</span> to <span\ndata-value="65.449995" data-unit="relpow">65</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="65.449995" data-unit="relpow">65</span>% FTP2min free ride4min @ <span\ndata-value="80.449992" data-unit="relpow">80</span>% FTP2min free ride3min @ <span\ndata-value="95.449996" data-unit="relpow">95</span>% FTP2min free ride2min @ <span\ndata-value="109.44999" data-unit="relpow">109</span>% FTP2min free ride1min @ <span\ndata-value="125.44999" data-unit="relpow">125</span>% FTP2min free ride15min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 50m

    Stress points: 54

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 9m

    Z2: 6m

    Z3: 29m

    Z4: 3m

    Z5: 2m

    Z6: 1m

    \n17%\n13%\n58%\n6%\n4%\n2%

    Introductory workout to be done prior to starting a training plan. Later in the week you will be completing your initial FTP test. Today\'s session is a great way to gauge where your FTP is before the test session.

    \nNo longer available in Zwift*\nView workout\nMore workouts like this

    *From Zwift 1.49 (early October 2023), Zwift has decided to reorganize its workout library into new collections. See more info here: FAQ: How do I obtain and use old Zwift workouts that are no longer available in Zwift?.

    Day 2 - Sub-Threshold #1

    10min from 50 to 75% FTP1min @ 50% FTP5min @ 98% FTP5min @ 55% FTP10min @ 89% FTP5min @ 55% FTP10min @ 89% FTP5min @ 55% FTP5min from 75 to 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n10min from <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span> to <span\ndata-value="75.449997" data-unit="relpow">75</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="98.449993" data-unit="relpow">98</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP10min @ <span\ndata-value="89.449996" data-unit="relpow">89</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP10min @ <span\ndata-value="88.867277" data-unit="relpow">89</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP5min from <span\ndata-value="75.449997" data-unit="relpow">75</span> to <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 56m

    Stress points: 57

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 22m

    Z2: 9m

    Z3: 20m

    Z4: 5m

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n39%\n17%\n36%\n9%\n0%\n0%

    The opening 5 minute threshold effort prepares you for the following 2 x 10 Sub-Threshold Interval.Note your heart rate at the completion of the 10 minute Sub-Threshold intervals. Did max HR rise, or were you able to maintain?

    Day 4 - FTP Test (short)

    5min from 30 to 70% FTP20sec @ 90% FTP20sec @ 110% FTP20sec @ 130% FTP3min @ 60% FTP3min @ 110% FTP2min @ 120% FTP6min @ 55% FTP20min free ride5min from 50 to 30% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n5min from <span\ndata-value="30.000001" data-unit="relpow">30</span> to <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP20sec @ <span\ndata-value="89.999998" data-unit="relpow">90</span>% FTP20sec @ <span\ndata-value="110" data-unit="relpow">110</span>% FTP20sec @ <span\ndata-value="130" data-unit="relpow">130</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="60.45" data-unit="relpow">60</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="110" data-unit="relpow">110</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="120" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP6min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP20min free ride5min from <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span> to <span\ndata-value="30.000001" data-unit="relpow">30</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 49

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 15m

    Z2: 4m

    Z3: 20m

    Z4: -

    Z5: 3m

    Z6: 2m

    \n33%\n9%\n45%\n0%\n7%\n5%

    The short variation of the standard FTP test starts off with a short warmup, a quick leg opening ramp, and a 5 minute hard effort to get the legs pumping. After a brief rest it\'s time to give it your all and go as hard as you can for 20 solid minutes. Pace yourself and try to go as hard as you can sustain for the entire 20 minutes - you will be scored on the final 20 minute segment. Upon saving your ride, you will be notified if your FTP improved.

    \nNo longer available in Zwift*\nView workout\nMore workouts like this

    *From Zwift 1.49 (early October 2023), Zwift has decided to reorganize its workout library into new collections. Workouts that are no longer available in Zwift can be downloaded from the official Zwift forum. See more info here: FAQ: How do I obtain and use old Zwift workouts that are no longer available in Zwift?.

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 2m 30s

    Stress points: 67

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 8m

    Z2: 3m

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: 2m

    Z5: 2m

    Z6: 3m

    \n13%\n5%\n72%\n3%\n3%\n4%

    NEUROMUSCULAR POWER #1-----WU:10 Min including 1 min efforts in zone 4 and 5.-----MS:Every 3min perform a 10 Sec surge.TARGET: Power Zone 3 (lower end of range)CADENCE: Vary cadence throughout the ride from 85-105rpm.

    Day 6 - AC Maintenance #1

    10min from 50 to 74% FTP1min @ 119% FTP1min 15sec @ 55% FTP1min @ 120% FTP1min 15sec @ 55% FTP1min @ 120% FTP1min 15sec @ 55% FTP1min @ 120% FTP1min 15sec @ 55% FTP1min @ 120% FTP1min 15sec @ 55% FTP1min @ 119% FTP1min 15sec @ 55% FTP1min @ 120% FTP1min 15sec @ 55% FTP1min @ 120% FTP1min @ 50% FTP25min @ 77% FTP5min from 75 to 51% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n10min from <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span> to <span\ndata-value="74.449998" data-unit="relpow">74</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.45" data-unit="relpow">119</span>% FTP1min 15sec @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.89731" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP1min 15sec @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.72048" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP1min 15sec @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.75026" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP1min 15sec @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.7433" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP1min 15sec @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.45" data-unit="relpow">119</span>% FTP1min 15sec @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.62765" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP1min 15sec @ <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="119.77476" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP25min @ <span\ndata-value="77.449995" data-unit="relpow">77</span>% FTP5min from <span\ndata-value="75.450003" data-unit="relpow">75</span> to <span\ndata-value="51.450002" data-unit="relpow">51</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 57m 45s

    Stress points: 65

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 16m

    Z2: 9m

    Z3: 25m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: 8m

    \n27%\n16%\n43%\n0%\n0%\n14%

    Complete 8 x 1 Min Anaerobic Capacity Intervals, before finishing with a 25 Min zone 2 effort.Observe your Heart Rate response during the 25 Min effort. How much does it increase throughout the effort?

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Day 2 - Season Base #1

    1min @ 50% FTP2x 1min @ 50% FTP,1min @ 91% FTP2x 1min @ 50% FTP,1min @ 107% FTP1min @ 50% FTP6min @ 98% FTP2min @ 55% FTP6min @ 98% FTP2min @ 55% FTP6min @ 98% FTP2min @ 55% FTP20min @ 78% FTP5min from 75 to 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n1min @ <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP2x 1min @ <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP,<br\n/> 1min @ <span\ndata-value="91.449988" data-unit="relpow">91</span>% FTP2x 1min @ <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP,<br\n/> 1min @ <span\ndata-value="107.45" data-unit="relpow">107</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP6min @ <span\ndata-value="98.000002" data-unit="relpow">98</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP6min @ <span\ndata-value="98.449993" data-unit="relpow">98</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP6min @ <span\ndata-value="98.000002" data-unit="relpow">98</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP20min @ <span\ndata-value="78.449994" data-unit="relpow">78</span>% FTP5min from <span\ndata-value="75.449997" data-unit="relpow">75</span> to <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 59m

    Stress points: 69

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 14m

    Z2: 3m

    Z3: 20m

    Z4: 20m

    Z5: 2m

    Z6: -

    \n24%\n5%\n34%\n34%\n3%\n0%

    WU:10 Min including 1 minute efforts in zone 4 and 5.-----MS1:3 x 6 Min Threshold Intervals.TARGET: Power Zone 4CADENCE: 90-100rpmRECOVERY: 2 Mins-----MS2:Ride prescribed time in Tempo ZoneTARGET: Power Zone 3CADENCE: Vary cadence throughout the ride from 85-105rpm.

    Day 4 - AC Maintenance #2

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Day 4 - Sub Threshold #3

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride

    Stress points: 48

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    PURE STRENGTH #1-----WU:10 Min increasing power through Power Zone 1 and 2. Include 3 x 6 Sec high cadence / low power sprints during warm up period.-----MS1:3 x 30 Sec Pure Strength (PS) High Power / Low Cadence Intervals.Remain seated for PS effortsTARGET: Power Zone 4 CADENCE: 50rpmRECOVERY: 5 Min-----Once PS intervals are completed, perform 10min Tempo including 3 x 10 Sec max sprints from close to race speed. 3 Min recovery between sprints.TARGET: Maximal effortCADENCE: 100+rpm

    TEMPO INTO SPRINTS #1-----WU:10-15 Min increasing power through Power Zone 1 and 2. Include 3 x 6 Sec high cadence / low power sprints during warm up period.-----MS1:10 Min Tempo interval leading into maximal sprintsTARGET: Power Zone 3CADENCE: 90-100rpmImmediately 10 Min Tempo is completed, perform the following sprint efforts60 Sec On / 60 Sec recovery30 Sec On / 30 Sec recovery15 Sec On / 45 Sec recovery10 Sec Max CADENCE: 100+rpm

    Day 5 - Strength into FTP #1

    10min from 50 to 75% FTP1min @ 50% FTP45sec @ 50rpm, 90% FTP4min @ 100% FTP5min @ 85rpm, 55% FTP45sec @ 50rpm, 90% FTP4min @ 100% FTP5min @ 55% FTP45sec @ 50rpm, 90% FTP4min @ 100% FTP5min @ 55% FTP5min @ 98% FTP4min @ 55% FTP5min @ 98% FTP4min @ 55% FTP5min @ 98% FTP4min @ 55% FTP5min from 75 to 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n10min from <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span> to <span\ndata-value="75.449997" data-unit="relpow">75</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP45sec @ 50rpm, <span\ndata-value="90.449995" data-unit="relpow">90</span>% FTP4min @ <span\ndata-value="100.44999" data-unit="relpow">100</span>% FTP5min @ 85rpm, <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP45sec @ 50rpm, <span\ndata-value="90.449995" data-unit="relpow">90</span>% FTP4min @ <span\ndata-value="100.39356" data-unit="relpow">100</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP45sec @ 50rpm, <span\ndata-value="90.449995" data-unit="relpow">90</span>% FTP4min @ <span\ndata-value="100.44999" data-unit="relpow">100</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="98.449993" data-unit="relpow">98</span>% FTP4min @ <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="98.000002" data-unit="relpow">98</span>% FTP4min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP5min @ <span\ndata-value="98.000002" data-unit="relpow">98</span>% FTP4min @ <span\ndata-value="55.449998" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP5min from <span\ndata-value="75.449997" data-unit="relpow">75</span> to <span\ndata-value="50.449997" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP

    PURE STRENGTH / FTP #1-----WU:10 Min increasing power through Power Zone 1 and 2. Include 3 x 6 Sec high cadence / low power sprints during warm up period.-----MS1:Complete 3 sets of the following45 Sec Pure Strength (PS) High Power / Low cadence. Remain seated. Immediately into 4 Min FTP at self selected cadenceTARGET: Power Zone 4CADENCE: 50rpmRECOVERY: 5 Min-----MS2:3 x 5 Min Threshold Intervals.TARGET: Power Zone 4CADENCE: 95-105rpmRECOVERY: 4 Min

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride

    Stress points: 48

    Z2: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

Include 3 x 6 Sec high cadence / low power sprints during warm up period.-----MS1:3 x 45 Sec Pure Strength (PS) High Power / Low Cadence Intervals.Remain seated for PS effortsTARGET: Power Zone 4 CADENCE: 50rpmRECOVERY: 5 Min-----Once PS intervals are completed, perform 10min Tempo including 3 x 10 Sec max sprints from close to race speed. 3 Min recovery between sprints.TARGET: Maximal effortCADENCE: 100+rpm

    TEMPO / VO2MAX #1After first completing some Endurance, perform a steady tempo effort, leading into Vo2 Max intervals.-----WU:10 Min increasing power through Power Zone 1 and 2. Include 3 x 30 Sec high cadence / low power efforts during warm up period.-----MS1:30 Min Tempo effortTARGET: Power Zone 3CADENCE: 90-100rpm.TERRAIN: Flat / Rolling-----MS3:3 x 2 Min Vo2 MaxTARGET: Power Zone 5CADENCE: 90-100rpm.RECOVERY: 2min

    40/20\'s into FTP #1After first completing some Endurance, perform 2 sets of 40/20\'s leading into FTP.-----WU:10-15 Min increasing power through Power Zone 1 and 2. Include 3 x 30 Sec high cadence / low power efforts during warm up period.-----MS1:4 x 40 Sec Power Z6 / 20 Sec Power Z1, leading straight into 10 Min Power Z4CADENCE: 90-100rpm.

    Day 2 - Cruise 3 x 9min

<span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 51m 30s

    Stress points: 117

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 28m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 1h 10m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: 2m

    \n25%\n11%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n1%

    Warm up then complete 2 x 15min SST efforts @ 90%*** Start each interval with 3 x 15sec surges with 30sec recovery. Following the 3rd surge, do not rest. Go straight into the SST effort.10min recovery between intervals.Remaining ride completed as Endurance Free RideCool down.

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 3m

    Stress points: 60

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 11m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n17%\n19%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    General endurance with the session completed as a \'Free Ride\'.However, throughout session complete 5 x 3-5sec max sprints.Aim to reach the same peak power for each sprint.Full recovery between sprints of at least 7min.

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    1min @ 50% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 76% FTP3min @ 55% FTP15sec @ 140% FTP30sec @ 55% FTP15sec @     Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 38m 15s

    Stress points: 104

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 39m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: 2m

    \n40%\n12%\n46%\n0%\n0%\n2%

    Warm up then complete3 x 15min SST efforts @ 90%*** Start each interval with 3 x 15sec max sprints with 30sec recovery. Following the 3rd surge do not rest. Go straight into the SST effort10min recovery between intervals.Cool down.

    Day 5 - Power max

    1min @ 50% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 76% FTP3min @ 55% FTP40min free ride1min @ 76% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP40min free ride1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 3m

    Stress points: 60

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 11m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n17%\n19%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    General endurance with the session completed as a \'Free Ride\'.However, throughout session complete 5 x 3-5sec max sprints.Aim to reach the same peak power for each sprint.Full recovery between sprints of at least 7min.

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Warm up 10min followed by3 x 15min efforts @ 98%, 95% and 91% respectively, with 2min recovery.Remaining ride completed as Endurance Free Ride.Cool down 10-20min.

    Day 5 - Power max

    1min @ 50% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 76% FTP3min @ 55% FTP40min free ride1min @ 76% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP40min free ride1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 3m

    Stress points: 60

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 11m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n17%\n19%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    General endurance with the session completed as a \'Free Ride\'.However, throughout session complete 5 x 3-5sec max sprints.Aim to reach the same peak power for each sprint.Full recovery between sprints of at least 7min.

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Workout overview

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z5: 12m

    \n26%\n14%\n46%\n0%\n14%\n0%

    After a good warm up and 1 hour of Endurance Free Riding, complete the following.4 x 3min @ Z5 Vo2 with 3min recovery.The aim is to increase power with each effort, with the final effort being the best.Cool down.

    Workout overview

    Stress points: 89

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 28m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: -

    Z4: 40m

    Z5: -

    Z6: 2m

    \n34%\n15%\n0%\n49%\n0%\n2%

    Warm up then complete2 x 20min SST efforts @ 90*** Start each interval with 3 x 15sec max sprints with 30sec recovery. Following the 3rd surge do not rest. Go straight into the SST effort10min recovery between intervals.Cool down.

    Day 6 - Tempo 1 x 60min

    1min @ 50% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 76% FTP3min @ 55% FTP1hr @ 85% FTP3min @ 55% FTP1min @ 76% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1hr @ <span\ndata-value="85.187501" data-unit="relpow">85</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 26m

    Stress points: 92

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 14m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 1h

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n16%\n14%\n70%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    Warm up 10min, then complete1 x 60min tempo effort @ 85%. However, vary your cadence by + or - 5rpm every 5min.Cool down 10min.

    Week 11

    Week 11

    Workouts: 5

    Average workout:

    Duration 1h 11m

    Stress points 80

    Zone distribution

    Z2: 47m

    Z3: 2h 35m

    Z4: 50m

    Z5: 25m

    Z6: -

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    \nNo longer available in Zwift*\nView workout\nMore workouts like this

@ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 32m

    Stress points: 104

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 26m

    Z2: 11m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: 15m

    Z6: -

    \n28%\n12%\n43%\n0%\n16%\n0%

    After a good warm up and 45min of Endurance Free Riding, complete the following.5 x 3min @ Z5 Vo2 with 3min recovery.The aim is to increase power with each effort, with the final effort being the best.Cool down.

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 3m

    Stress points: 60

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 11m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n17%\n19%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    General endurance with the session completed as a \'Free Ride\'.However, throughout session complete 5 x 3-5sec max sprints.Aim to reach the same peak power for each sprint.Full recovery between sprints of at least 7min.

    Warm up then complete2 x 20min SST efforts @ 90%.*** Every 90sec increase power to 110%FTP for 30sec.10min recovery between intervals.Cool down.

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 14m

    Stress points: 88

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 29m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 15m

    Z4: -

    Z5: 18m

    Z6: -

    \n39%\n16%\n20%\n0%\n24%\n0%

    After a good warm up and 15min Endurance Free Riding, complete the following.6 x 3min @ Z5 Vo2 with 3min recovery.The aim is to increase power with each effort, with the final effort being the best.Cool down.

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 3m

    Stress points: 60

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 11m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n17%\n19%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    General endurance with the session completed as a \'Free Ride\'.However, throughout session complete 5 x 3-5sec max sprints.Aim to reach the same peak power for each sprint.Full recovery between sprints of at least 7min.

    Week 13

    Week 13

    Workouts: 5

    Total duration: 5h 48m

    Total stress points: 369

    Average workout:

    Duration 1h 10m

    Stress points 74

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 1h 47m

    Z2: 45m

    Z3: 2h 5m

    Z4: 1h 4m

    Z6: 7m

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Day 4 - Power max

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 3m

    Stress points: 60

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 11m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n17%\n19%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    General endurance with the session completed as a \'Free Ride\'.However, throughout session complete 5 x 3-5sec max sprints.Aim to reach the same peak power for each sprint.Full recovery between sprints of at least 7min.

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 38m 15s

    Stress points: 115

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 24m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: 20m

    Z5: -

    Z6: 2m

    \n24%\n12%\n41%\n20%\n0%\n2%

    Warm up then complete3 x 20min SST efforts @ 88-94%FTP*** Start each interval with 3 x 15sec max sprints with 30sec recovery. Following the 3rd sprint do not rest. Straight into the SST effort.5min recovery between intervals.Cool down.

    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 9m

    Stress points: 64

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 27m

    Z2: 9m

    Z3: 30m

    Z5: -

    \n39%\n13%\n43%\n0%\n0%\n4%

    Warm up well, including 3 x 6 second accelerations during the 10 minute warm up. Followed by 2 sets of 3 x 30sec @ Z6 power with 2min recovery.Riding between sets is \'Free Ride Endurance\'.Cool down.

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    \nNo longer available in Zwift*\nView workout\nMore workouts like this

    Day 2 - Anaerobic Intensive x 4

    5min @ 50% FTP1min @ 57% FTP1min @ 63% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 76% FTP3min @ 55% FTP30sec @ 90% FTP2min @ 55% FTP30sec @ 90% FTP2min @ 55% FTP30sec @ 90% FTP2min @ 55% FTP30sec @ 90% FTP2min @ 55% @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP30sec @ <span\ndata-value="89.999998"     Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 14m

    Stress points: 63

    Zone distribution

    Z2: 9m

    Z3: 34m

    Z5: -

    \n42%\n12%\n46%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    Warm up well, including 3 x 6 second accelerations during the 10 minute warm up. Followed by 2 sets of 4 x 30sec @ Z6 power with 2min recovery.Riding between sets is \'Free Ride Endurance\'.Cool down.

    Day 3 - FTP Test (short)

    5min from 30 to 70% FTP20sec @ 90% FTP20sec @ 110% FTP20sec @ 130% FTP3min @ 60% FTP3min @ 110% FTP2min @ 120% FTP6min @ 55% FTP20min free ride5min from 50 to 30% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n5min from <span\ndata-value="30.000001" data-unit="relpow">30</span> to <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP20sec @ <span\ndata-value="89.999998" data-unit="relpow">90</span>% FTP20sec @ <span\ndata-value="110" data-unit="relpow">110</span>% FTP20sec @ <span\ndata-value="130" data-unit="relpow">130</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="60.000002" data-unit="relpow">60</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="110" data-unit="relpow">110</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="120" data-unit="relpow">120</span>% FTP6min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP20min free ride5min from <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span> to <span\ndata-value="30.000001" data-unit="relpow">30</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 49

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 15m

    Z2: 4m

    Z3: 20m

    Z4: -

    Z5: 3m

    Z6: 2m

    \n33%\n9%\n45%\n0%\n7%\n5%

    Let\'s see how much you have improved over the last 14 weeks!The short variation of the standard FTP test starts off with a short warmup, a quick leg opening ramp, and a 5 minute hard effort to get the legs pumping. After a brief rest it\'s time to give it your all and go as hard as you can for 20 solid minutes. Pace yourself and try to go as hard as you can sustain for the entire 20 minutes - you will be scored on the final 20 minute segment. Upon saving your ride, you will be notified if your FTP improved.

    \nNo longer available in Zwift*\nView workout\nMore workouts like this

    *From Zwift 1.49 (early October 2023), Zwift has decided to reorganize its workout library into new collections. Use More workouts like this to find identical workouts in new workout collections or training plans in Zwift. Workouts that are no longer available in Zwift can be downloaded from the official Zwift forum. See more info here: FAQ: How do I obtain and use old Zwift workouts that are no longer available in Zwift?.

    Day 1 - Endurance /Free Ride

    45min free rideView watts\nEnter FTP\n45min free ride
    Workout overview

    Duration: 45m

    Stress points: 48

    Zone distribution

    Z1: -

    Z2: -

    Z3: 45m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n0%\n0%\n100%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    A steady endurance ride today.Ride as you feel aiming to keep power within Z2-3.Don\'t forget it\'s fine to miss a day if you have to. Just move onto the next planned session.

    Day 3 - Anaerobic #1

    10min from 50 to 75% FTP1min @ 55% FTP35sec @ 180% FTP2min @ 56% FTP35sec @ 180% FTP2min @ 56% FTP35sec @ 180% FTP2min @ 56% FTP10min @ 75% FTP1min @ 56% FTP35sec @ 180% FTP2min @ 56% FTP35sec @ 180% FTP2min @ 57% FTP35sec @ 180% FTP2min @ 56% FTP10min from 75 to 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n10min from <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span> to <span\ndata-value="75" data-unit="relpow">75</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP35sec @ <span\ndata-value="180" data-unit="relpow">180</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP35sec @ <span\ndata-value="180" data-unit="relpow">180</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP35sec @ <span\ndata-value="180" data-unit="relpow">180</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP10min @ <span\ndata-value="75" data-unit="relpow">75</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP35sec @ <span\ndata-value="180" data-unit="relpow">180</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP35sec @ <span\ndata-value="180" data-unit="relpow">180</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="56.999999" data-unit="relpow">57</span>% FTP35sec @ <span\ndata-value="180" data-unit="relpow">180</span>% FTP2min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP10min from <span\ndata-value="75" data-unit="relpow">75</span> to <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 47m 30s

    Stress points: 64

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 22m

    Z2: 22m

    Z3: -

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: 4m

    \n46%\n46%\n0%\n0%\n0%\n7%

    The aim today is to produce repeatable, high power intervals.With 2 sets of the 35 second Anaerobic Intensive intervals, note any differences in your heart rate response from the first to the second set.Between the Anaerobic Intensive sets, we complete a 10 minute tempo effort to build some fatigue.

    \nNo longer available in Zwift*\nView workout\nMore workouts like this

    Day 5 - Power max

    1min @ 50% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 76% FTP3min @ 55% FTP40min free ride1min @ 76% FTP1min @ 73% FTP1min @ 70% FTP1min @ 67% FTP1min @ 64% FTP1min @ 62% FTP1min @ 59% FTP1min @ 56% FTP1min @ 53% FTP1min @ 50% FTPView watts\nEnter FTP\n1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP3min @ <span\ndata-value="55.000001" data-unit="relpow">55</span>% FTP40min free ride1min @ <span\ndata-value="75.999999" data-unit="relpow">76</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="73.000002" data-unit="relpow">73</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="69.999999" data-unit="relpow">70</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="67.000002" data-unit="relpow">67</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="63.999999" data-unit="relpow">64</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="62" data-unit="relpow">62</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="58.999997" data-unit="relpow">59</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="56" data-unit="relpow">56</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="52.999997" data-unit="relpow">53</span>% FTP1min @ <span\ndata-value="50" data-unit="relpow">50</span>% FTP
    Workout overview

    Duration: 1h 3m

    Stress points: 60

    Zone distribution

    Z1: 11m

    Z2: 12m

    Z3: 40m

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    \n17%\n19%\n63%\n0%\n0%\n0%

    General endurance with the session completed as a \'Free Ride\'.However, throughout session complete 5 x 3-5sec max sprints.Aim to reach the same peak power for each sprint.Full recovery between sprints of at least 7min.

    Stress points: 0

    Z4: -

    Z5: -

    Z6: -

    Today is the day all of your hard work in training will pay off.Remember to hydrate well throughout the ride and eat regularly.Good luck!
